name: OCKReadableTaskStore
desc: A read-only store that fetches task-data objects.

items.name: func fetchTask(withID: String, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Task>)
items.desc: Fetches a task asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func fetchTasks(query: Self.TaskQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Task]>)
items.desc: Fetches an array of tasks asynchronously from the store.
